title: Best of The Program | Guest: Elijah Schaffer | 4/20/20
description:
In today’s coronavirus update, Americans are protesting stay-at-home orders across the country because of tyranny, NOT closed theaters. And are we facing shortages of carbonated beverages and frozen pizzas? BlazeTV’s Elijah Schaffer breaks down the telling differences between what the media reports and what he actually saw at a protest in Seattle. In the perfect example of why Americans are protesting, NYC Mayor Bill de Blasio told residents to rat out social distancing dissenters by photographing them.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
